passwordGenerator

Class FileIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • passwordGenerator.FileIO

  • public final class FileIO
extends java.lang.Object
    this class can do:
    - shows a file open dialog
    - shows a file save dialog
    - shows a written done dialog
    - can write a line (as String) out into a text file
    - can append a line (as String) out into a text file
    - can append (with a tab before) a line (as String) out into a text file

    Version:
    2012-08-25
    Author:
    Kevin Weis

    • Method Detail

      • dialogWritten

        public static void dialogWritten(java.io.File file)
        shows a dialog of success.

        Parameters:
        file - (as File) the file what what have been written.

      • lineWrite

        public static java.lang.Boolean lineWrite(java.lang.String line)
        append a string (as new line) to a linked list.

        Parameters:
        line - (as String) the content to write.
        Returns:
        returning true upon success and throwing an IllegalStateException if no space is currently available.

      • write

        public static void write(java.io.File file)
        To write the linked list into a file.
        File will be created if not exists.
        File will be overwritten if exists!!!

        Parameters:
        file - (as File) the file to write into.

      • lineAppandTab

        public static void lineAppandTab(java.lang.String text)
        append a string to a linked list but first add a space (tab).
        Parameters:
        text - (as String) the content to append.

      • lineAppand

        public static void lineAppand(java.lang.String text)
        append a string to a linked list.
        Parameters:
        text - (as String) the content to write.

      • writeAppand

        public static void writeAppand(java.io.File file)
        Append the linked list to a text file.
        File will be created if not exists.
        Parameters:
        file - (as File) the file to write into.
